long_description: The telescoping Thule Bed Rider truck rack allows 2 bikes to be transported securely without causing damage to pickup beds or to bikes. Telescoping bar design fits full-size and small pickup beds with a width between 47.75 - 72 in. Expanding cam mechanism and generous rubber feet hold carrier in place against side wall railings without drilling or bolting. Includes two 9mm quick-release fork mount skewers (bikes must feature quick-release front skewers). High-quality, corrosion-resistant aluminum construction ensures durability. Thule Bed Rider truck rack is compatible with bed liners. Rack can be locked to truck bed with included Thule lock cyclinder. Not compatible with tandem or recumbent bikes.
short_description: The telescoping Thule Bed Rider truck rack allows 2 bikes to be transported securely without causing damage to pickup beds or to bikes.
